name: Fjallraven Abisko Midsummer Trousers - Women's
description:
Lightweight pants with a technical cut and stretch fabric that lets you move quickly toward the next patch of shade.Breathable G-1000 Air Stretch fabric suits warmer climates.Waist is cut high in the back for coverage and comfort under a backpack.2 front hand pockets with internal mesh.Vents from hip to knee.Side pockets close with a zip and a button.Cuffs with drawcord adjustments.

        Sustainability
